scripts.DC_ON__Process_ALL: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& npx alice-runtime process --path ../app --stage local
scripts.DC_ON__Process_1_Command: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& npx alice-runtime process-commands --max-commands 1 --path ../app --stage local
scripts.DC_ON__Dispatch_1_Event: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& npx alice-runtime dispatch-events --max-events 1 --max-runtime 60 --stage local
scripts.DC_ON__Process_1_Trigger: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& npx alice-runtime process-trigger --max-trigger 1 --max-trigger-events 1 --path ../app --stage local
scripts.DC_ON__Dashboard_API_SERVER: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& npx alice-runtime dashboard-api --port 3010 --path-prefix /dashboard/ --stage local
